title: Michal Poluch
text:
Michal Poluch (born 6 June 1991) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Topo%C4%BE%C4%8Dany">FC Topoľčany</a>.
Career.
FC Nitra.
He made his debut for <a href="FC%20Nitra">FC Nitra</a> against <a href="FK%20Senica">FK Senica</a> on 12 May 2012.
